body: You can move through an unoccupied square without difficulty in most circumstances. Difficult terrain and a number of spell effects might hamper your movement through open spaces.
name: Moving Through a Square

sections.body: You can move through a square occupied by a friendly character, unless you are charging. When you move through a square occupied by a friendly character, that character doesn't provide you with cover.
sections.name: Friend

sections.body: You can't move through a square occupied by an opponent unless the opponent is helpless. You can move through a square occupied by a helpless opponent without penalty. Some creatures, particularly very large ones, may present an obstacle even when helpless. In such cases, each square you move through counts as 2 squares.
sections.name: Opponent

sections.body: You can't end your movement in the same square as another creature unless it is helpless.
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Movement/Position/And Distance/Moving Through a Square/Ending Your Movement
sections.name: Ending Your Movement

sections.body: During your movement, you can attempt to move through a square occupied by an opponent (see Overrun).
sections.name: Overrun

sections.body: A trained character can attempt to use Acrobatics to move through a square occupied by an opponent (see the Acrobatics skill).
sections.name: Tumbling

sections.body: A Fine, Diminutive, or Tiny creature can move into or through an occupied square. The creature provokes attacks of opportunity when doing so.
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Movement/Position/And Distance/Moving Through a Square/Very Small Creature
sections.name: Very Small Creature

sections.body:
Any creature can move through a square occupied by a creature three size categories larger than itself.

A big creature can move through a square occupied by a creature three size categories smaller than it is. Creatures moving through squares occupied by other creatures provoke attacks of opportunity from those creatures.
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Movement/Position/And Distance/Moving Through a Square/Square Occupied by Creature Three Sizes Larger or Smaller
sections.name: Square Occupied by Creature Three Sizes Larger or Smaller

sections.body: Some creatures break the above rules. A creature that completely fills the squares it occupies cannot be moved past, even with the Acrobatics skill or similar special abilities.
sections.url: pfsrd://Core Rulebook/Rules/Combat/Movement/Position/And Distance/Moving Through a Square/Designated Exceptions
sections.name: Designated Exceptions
